import React from 'react' import './productpage.css' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' // Actions import { getProductsDetails } from '../../redux/actions/productActions' import {addToCart} from '../../redux/actions/cartActions' const Productpage = ({match,history}) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.getProductsDetails); const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; useEffect(()=>{ if(product && match.params.id !== product._id){ dispatch(getProductsDetails(match.params.id)); } },[dispatch,match,product]) return (
{loading ?

Loading...

: error ?

Price: $499.99

Description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nam distinctio, numquam saepe corrupti quisquam earum, enim unde nisi dignissimos ut quo voluptatibus mollitia architecto eum.

)}
) } export default Productpage
